version_description: New facts added!

- Read facts by swiping left or right
- Explore interesting books to expand your knowledge on random facts
- Improved sharing with Instagram

And now with Facts Premium you can:
+ Remove Ads
+ Save facts to Favorite
+ Change Font and Colors

- Increasing font
- Fixing reminders for iOS 11
Find facts by word or expression with the new Search!

Share Facts from the new iMessage app!
